DOC.brief_summary: This is an open parallel design randomized trial of amiodarone plus a beta blocker vs a beta blocker alone vs sotalol for the prevention of ICD shocks in patients receiving an ICD for spontaneous or inducible ventricular tachycardia or fibrillation
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Pharmacological Therapy In Implantable Defibrillator Patients (OPTIC)
DOC.criteria: spontaneous or inducible ventricular tachycardia or fibrillation
